comments.author: Bugabuga.9721
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

The fix for this is now live.

Yay, see the guild claiming info. Thank you for fixing this

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: The fix for this is now live.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: 6/2 was just a hotfix for a server crash IIRC; the guild claiming fix should land in the next patch.

comments.author: Naga.1805
comments.body: Is the guild claiming API fix still slated to go out with the next patch? I see there was a quick patch on 6/2, but I am guessing that didn’t attempt to fix this API issue.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: It’s an issue with how the changes get communicated between some of the backend servers; I think we have a fix but it isn’t slated to be deployed until the next patch goes out (and I’m not sure when that is).

comments.author: fro.8967
comments.body: Do you happen to have any updates on the guild claim information problem?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Oof, that’s going to take a bit longer to fix, I think.

comments.author: fro.8967
comments.body: Quick update: It looks like the match_details API is not returning guild claim information right now.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: The WvW API is back up. I also brought the EU matchup issues to the attention of the appropriate parties; they’re looking at it now.

comments.author: Tiersten.8502
comments.body:
Erm. Yeah. It looks like there are more issues with WvW than just the API. On the Aurora Glade + Abaddon’s Mouth + Drakkar Lake matchup, everybody in EB is the same side. There is a 180+ player blob roaming around at the moment because everything is friendly.

SM castle is going nuts as it is simultaneously tier 1, tier 2 and tier 3 with the walls trying to display all 3 textures at the same time.

None of the keep portals or the spawn WPs work. You can walk straight into somebody elses spawn as well since everything is friendly.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Looks like one of the backend servers is coughing up a storm; I’ve pinged the people responsible to have a look. It should be back up soon, sorry about that

comments.author: Tiersten.8502
comments.body: Yeah. All of the matches EU and NA have missing data for match_details. It appears to have stopped working when the patch was applied server side.
